demos.title: Linear Regression
demos.description: Explore how linear regression finds the best line through data points.

demos.title: Gradient Descent
demos.description: Step through gradient descent one iteration at a time.

demos.title: Multi-Linear Regression
demos.description: Interactive demonstration of multi-linear regression with real-time feature selection.

demos.title: Higher-Order Features
demos.description: Visualize the bias-variance tradeoff using real bike rental data. Adjust polynomial degree to see underfitting, optimal fit, and overfitting.

demos.title: Feature Engineering
demos.description: Explore how higher model capacity can cause overfitting in polynomial regression and the effects of L1 and L2 regularisation to mitigate this.

demos.title: Regularisation
demos.description: Understand how L1 (Lasso) and L2 (Ridge) regularisation prevent overfitting by penalizing model complexity. Interactive visualization of regularisation effects on polynomial regression.

demos.title: Regularised GD
demos.description: Visualize how L1 and L2 regularization geometrically reshape the loss surface and affect gradient descent trajectories. Watch optimization paths converge to different solutions based on penalty strength.

demos.title: Perceptrons
demos.description: The first neural network algorithm: step through perceptron learning epoch-by-epoch, watching the decision boundary adapt to separate two classes.

demos.title: 1-D Classification
demos.description: Interactive logistic regression with adjustable decision boundaries. See how the sigmoid function creates smooth classification boundaries.

demos.title: 2-D Classification
demos.description: Multi-class classification with various boundary types (linear, polynomial, radial basis). Experiment with different decision boundary shapes.

demos.title: Classification Metrics
demos.description: Adjust decision thresholds and explore sensitivity, specificity, precision, accuracy, F1-score, and balanced accuracy. See why accuracy fails with imbalanced data.

demos.title: Neural Networks
demos.description: Build and train neural networks with adjustable architecture and parameters. Experiment with different layer sizes and activation functions.

demos.title: Backpropagation
demos.description: Step-by-step visualization of the backpropagation algorithm. Watch how gradients flow backward through the network layers.

demos.title: ANN Applications
demos.description: Train neural networks on real civil engineering datasets. Configure architecture, compare with linear regression, and make predictions in real-world units.

demos.title: Convolution & Pooling
demos.description: Interactive exploration of CNN operations with real-time filter visualization. See how convolution and pooling operations transform images.

demos.title: CNN Architecture
demos.description: Complete MNIST digit classification with real PyTorch backend and epoch-by-epoch training visualization.

demos.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
demos.description: Discover how RNNs process sequential data step-by-step. Visualize hidden state evolution and understand the core mechanics of recurrent processing.

demos.title: Attention Mechanism
demos.description: Explore how attention mechanisms work through Q, K, V computations and dot-product attention. Visualize how tokens attend to each other in sequence processing.

demos.title: K-Means Clustering
demos.description: Interactive clustering demonstration with step-by-step k-means algorithm visualization. Add your own points and watch how centroids move to minimize within-cluster distances.

demos.title: Multi-Armed Bandit
demos.description: Explore the exploration vs exploitation tradeoff with interactive epsilon-greedy algorithm. Watch an agent learn to balance trying new actions with exploiting known good ones.
